alert.note: Alert for Mobile Central; Mobile Inland (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 1:48PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Mobile County through 230 PM CDT... At 147 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over Mobile Regional Airport, or 6 miles west of Midtown Mobile, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Midtown Mobile, Downtown Mobile, Prichard, Tillmans Corner, Theodore, Chickasaw, Semmes, I65 And I165, I65 And AL 158, I10 And I65 and Mobile Regional Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
